Race.SpecificTitle: Justice of the Peace -- Justice of the Peace District 5
Parishwide Proposition No. 1 of 2 -- 3 Mills Renewal - PC - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of St. James, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), continue to levy a three (3) mills tax on all property subject to taxation in said Parish (an estimated $1,900,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years beginning with the year 2022 and ending with the year 2031, for the purpose of operating and maintaining drainage facilities in the Parish?

Race.SpecificTitle: Parishwide Proposition No. 2 of 2 -- 3.92 Mills Renewal - PC - 7 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of St. James, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), continue to levy and collect a special tax of three and ninety-two hundredths (3.92) mills on all the property subject to taxation within the Parish (an estimated $2,500,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of seven (7) years, beginning with the year 2025 and ending with the year 2031, for the purpose of operating and maintaining the Human Resources Department of the Parish?

Race.SpecificTitle: Fire Protection District No. 2 -- 0.74 Mills Renewal - PC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Fire Protection District No. 2 Proposition
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Fire Protection District No. 2 of the Parish of St. James, State of Louisiana (the "District"), continue to levy a seventy-four hundredths (0.74) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation in said District (an estimated $430,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2022 and ending with the year 2031, for the purpose of acquiring, improving and maintaining the buildings, machinery and equipment of said District?
